bibl.title: Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Map-by-map Directory. Volume I; - Volume II.
bibl.note: Printed version (separately distributed) of the CD-ROM which accompanies the Atlas. The principal components of each directory are three: an introductory text; a listing of names and features; and a bibliography. - See in part. Volume II, pp. 1108-1198: 73. Ammon (compiler: D.J. MATTINGLY), pp. 1108-1116; - 74. Delta (A. BERNAND), pp. 1117-1124; - 75. Memphis - Oxyrhynchus (R. MÜLLER-WOLLERMANN), p. 1139; - 76. Sinai (D.F. GRAF), pp. 1140-1146; - 77. Hermopolis Magna (M. DREW-BEAR), pp. 1147-1157; - 78. Porphyrites et Claudianus Montes (S.E. SIDEBOTHAM), pp. 1158-1163; - 79. Oasis Magna (G. WAGNER), pp. 1164-1169; - 80. Coptos - Berenice (J. KEENAN, S.E. SIDEBOTHAM, T. WILFONG), pp. 1170-1180; - 81. Triakontaschoinos (S.M. BURSTEIN, with the assistance of D. BOROUGH), pp. 1181-1187; - 82. Meroe (N.B. MILLET), pp. 1188-1191; - 83. Nabataea Meridionalis (D.F. GRAF), pp. 1192-1198.
bibl.seg: TALBERT Richard J.A. (Ed.), in collaboration with Roger S. BAGNALL et alii, Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Map-by-map Directory. Volume I; - Volume II.
Princeton - Oxford, Princeton University Press, 2000, 4°, xxii-pp. 1-746; - xxii-pp. 747-1383; - 1 CD-ROM. ISBN 0-691-04945-9. $150.

Printed version (separately distributed) of the CD-ROM which accompanies the Atlas. The principal components of each directory are three: an introductory text; a listing of names and features; and a bibliography. - See in part. Volume II, pp. 1108-1198: 73. Ammon (compiler: D.J. MATTINGLY), pp. 1108-1116; - 74. Delta (A. BERNAND), pp. 1117-1124; - 75. Memphis - Oxyrhynchus (R. MÜLLER-WOLLERMANN), p. 1139; - 76. Sinai (D.F. GRAF), pp. 1140-1146; - 77. Hermopolis Magna (M. DREW-BEAR), pp. 1147-1157; - 78. Porphyrites et Claudianus Montes (S.E. SIDEBOTHAM), pp. 1158-1163; - 79. Oasis Magna (G. WAGNER), pp. 1164-1169; - 80. Coptos - Berenice (J. KEENAN, S.E. SIDEBOTHAM, T. WILFONG), pp. 1170-1180; - 81. Triakontaschoinos (S.M. BURSTEIN, with the assistance of D. BOROUGH), pp. 1181-1187; - 82. Meroe (N.B. MILLET), pp. 1188-1191; - 83. Nabataea Meridionalis (D.F. GRAF), pp. 1192-1198.
Talbert Bagnall Mattingly Bernand Müller-Wollermann Graf Drew-Bear Sidebotham Wagner Keenan Wilfong Burstein Borough Millet
